info.title: Connected Car portal API to proxy GZone2
info.description: Current documentation contains only Connected Car API that only relates to Gamification platform (GZone2). Portal control access rights of the players, therefore those API that has /Subscriptions/{subscription_id} should be called only by the END USERS (to correctly resolve player name) with subscription id that belongs to that user. All other API calls are only available for admins! Subscription is a policy/vehicle/unit entity that is used in portal and user can have multiple subscriptions (i.e. policies/vehicles)

get.summary: Get all games (authenticated by admin)
Get game statistics by name (authenticated by admin)
Get game rounds by name (authenticated by admin)
get.description: Rounds can be completed or in progress.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Game name

parameters.name: createdOnFrom
parameters.description: Round creation date range from. Sample format: "2019-09-16T08:44:29.686Z".

parameters.name: createdOnTo
parameters.description: Round creation date range to. Sample format: "2020-09-16T08:44:29.686Z".

parameters.name: startOnFrom
parameters.description: Round start date range from. If game period is daily, weekly, monthly or yearly round start date is start of the period, otherwise start date is same as creation date. Sample format: "2019-09-16T08:44:29.686Z".

parameters.name: startOnTo
parameters.description: Round start date range to. If game period is daily, weekly, monthly or yearly round start date is start of the period, otherwise start date is same as creation date. Sample format: "2020-09-16T08:44:29.686Z".

get.summary: Get game transactions by name (authenticated by admin)
get.description: Transaction is generated when player completes a game.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Game name

parameters.name: createdOnFrom
parameters.description: Transaction creation date range from. Sample format: "2019-09-16T08:44:29.686Z".

parameters.name: createdOnTo
parameters.description: Transaction creation date range to. Sample format: "2020-09-16T08:44:29.686Z".

get.summary: Get players who can participate in game by name (authenticated by admin)
Get image by internal id
get.description: If width is not specified, full size image is returned

get.summary: Get player rank by name and leaderboard together with other rival scores (authenticated by End-User with access to subscription)
get.description: Rounds can be completed or in progress. Rivals will not include player himslef.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: Subscription id

parameters.name: leaderboardName
parameters.description: Leaderboard name

parameters.name: startOn
parameters.description: Round start date. Sample format: "2019-09-16T08:44:29.686Z".

parameters.name: rankFrom
parameters.description: Rival rank from.

parameters.name: rankTo
parameters.description: Rival rank to.

get.summary: Get player games by subscription id (authenticated by End-User with access to subscription)
get.description: Only games which player can start. If game is started, it won't be returned. Also affected by game parameter: Max Occurrences.

parameters.name: subscription_id
parameters.description: Subscription id

get.description: Only leaderboards which player can start. If leaderboard is started, it won't be returned.
